title: Windows 7 Ultimate SP1U x64 Aug 2013 IE11 NET451 VC++ DirectX
description:
Windows 7 Ultimate SP1U x64 En-US integrated updates until August 2013, IE11 Preview, .NET Framework 4.5.1 Preview, Visual C++ redist 2005-2012 AIO x86 x64 with updates, DirectX redist June 2010, and Windows Loader 2.2.1 by Daz for pre-activated.

Also integrated 3rd party driver. Driver-driver added using dism after add-package:
AMD HDC Driver 5.2.2.0179
Asmedia USB3 Driver v1.16.4.0
Realtek HD Audio Driver 6.0.1.6971 - HDXCR Driver for PC
Realtek LAN Driver 7.073.0618.2013
SMBus AMD v5.12.0.0015

Runtime software added inside Scripts folder: 
Slim .NET Framework 4.5.1 Preview by ricktendo at wincert forum
Visual C++ Redist 2005-2012 AIO integrated updates by ricktendo at wincert forum
DirectX Redist June 2010
(these runtimes is for playing game, and also for Visio app)

iso Name: 7USP164_Aug2013_IE11.iso
MD5: 9f164e0aebf962674d2fed251e9dffe0
SHA-1: a6f5f276099c3657b957d1b571e436afd2d66273
CRC-32: 1a53084b

Source this OS from:
X17-59465.iso ; Windows 7 Ultimate SP1U x64 English by Digital River

Tools that i've used:
dism for integrate updates and drivers into wim
imageX for export image with command /export compress maximum
oscdimg for making iso

Installation Index:
index 1:
Name: Windows 7 ULTIMATE
Description: Windows 7 ULTIMATE
Display Name: Windows 7 Ultimate
Display Description: Windows 7 Ultimate
Flag: Ultimate

The iso is only contain 1 index, because  i did not added Professional, Home Basic, and Home Premium index, because i only want Ultimate. And, about index name, i did not rename the Display Name and Display Description, Image Name and Image Description. Nothing changed in the index name.

No tweak, no autounattend in here. Also all KB files not converted to cab, all KB files are msu, nothing changed.

And, this is my steps during integrating...

1) mount install.wim with dism

2) integrate IE11 Pre-requisites:
KB2533623
KB2639308
KB2670838
KB2729094-v2
KB2731771
KB2786081
KB2834140 (patch for KB2670838)

3) integrate IE11 Preview exe installer that i've extracted became cab:
IE-Win7.cab

4) integrate IE11 Add-On:
IE-Hyphenation-en.msu
IE-Spelling-en.msu

5) integrate Important Updates:
KB971033, KB2479943, KB2491683, KB2506014, KB2506212, KB2506928-v2, KB2532531, KB2536275, KB2536276-v2, KB2544893, KB2552343, KB2560656, KB2564958, KB2570947, KB2579686, KB2584146, KB2585542, KB2604115, KB2618451, KB2619339, KB2620704, KB2621440, KB2631813, KB2644615, KB2645640, KB2653956, KB2654428, KB2655992, KB2656356, KB2667402-v2, KB2676562, KB2685939, KB2690533, KB2691442, KB2698365, KB2705219-v2, KB2712808, KB2718704, KB2727528, KB2729452, KB2736422, KB2742599, KB2743555, KB2753842-v2, KB2756921, KB2757638, KB2758857, KB2770660, KB2785220, KB2786081, KB2789645, KB2790113, KB2798162, KB2803821-v2, KB2804579, KB2807986, KB2813170, KB2813347, KB2813430, KB2820197, KB2830290, KB2832414, KB2833946, KB2834886, KB2835361, KB2835364, KB2839894, KB2840149, KB2840631, KB2844286-v2, KB2845187, KB2847927, KB2849470, KB2850851, KB2861855, KB2862966, KB2863058, KB2868623

6) integrate Optional Updates:
KB2506928-v2, KB2515325, KB2541014, KB2545698, KB2547666, KB2563227, KB2574819, KB2592687, KB2640148-v2, KB2647753-v4, KB2660075, KB2685811, KB2685813, KB2699779-v2, KB2709630, KB2709981-v2, KB2719857, KB2726535, KB2732059-v5, KB2732500-v2, KB2750841, KB2761217, KB2763523, KB2773072, KB2786400, KB2791765, KB2799926, KB2808679, KB2813956, KB2820331, KB2834140-v2, KB2836942, KB2836943-v2

7) integrate Windows Update Agent 3.0 offline installer for bonus package:
WUClient-SelfUpdate-ActiveX.cab
WUClient-SelfUpdate-Aux-TopLevel.cab
WUClient-SelfUpdate-Core-TopLevel.cab

8) integrate drivers

9) copy runtime software, Windows Loader, KB2603229, KB2533552, and setupcomplete.cmd into Scripts folder, and then copy Scripts folder into Setup folder, and unmount image with commit for finish

10) export image with imagex for making fresh wim

11) making iso with oscdimg without compress for faster process

- Note:
2 updates which will be installed at the end setup windows: KB2603229 and KB2533552, because these update can not be installed by offline install. 
Another update is not added: Windows Malicious Software Removal Tool and Definition Update for Windows Defender.
